SELECT SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID , NAME , MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
FROM SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

UPDATE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD SET
NAME = :NAME ,MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID = :MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID = :SI_ADVANCED_SEARCH_CONDITION_HEAD_ID AND TS = :TS
